# Professional Services Solicitation: Senior Employee Relations Consultant

## Overview
This solicitation is issued by Transport Canada (TC) for the provision of professional services to support employee relations.

## Solicitation Details
- Reference Number: PW-22-01008580
- Solicitation Number: T8493-22-0030
- Publication Date: October 12, 2022
- Tender Closing Date and Time: October 19, 2022, at 14:00:00

## Solicitation Description
TC seeks a senior-level employee relations consultant to provide professional services under Stream 1 of the Transportation Sector Aviation and Rail Labour Relations (TSAR) Program. The selected consultant will work with TC to address employee relations matters in a manner that supports the agency's goals and objectives.

## Key Criteria
- Period of Contract: June 30, 2023, with an optional extension
- Scope of Work: One (1) Senior Level Resource, Human Resources, Category 1.4

## Eligibility
Only pre-qualified suppliers under the Transportation Services Procurement System (TSPS) are eligible to participate in this solicitation.

## Agency Contact
For any inquiries, please contact Tanya Nadeau at  tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca or 343-575-6684.

## Notice Disclaimer
The TC is responsible for ensuring the accuracy and completeness of the information contained in this solicitation. All potential bidders are advised to verify the details with the agency, if necessary. This solicitation is subject to revision or modification without notice. No extensions to the submission deadline will be considered.

## Tender Status
This solicitation has expired. However, interested suppliers who have already been pre-qualified may refer to it for reference purposes. I
